description: Target friendly hero gains +1 shadow energy for each Shadow ally you control. Draw a card for each location you control.

name: Groundshift
description: Duration 1. When Groundshift is summoned, the active location is exiled. Heroes and allies lose all passive abilities.

name: Spontaneous Growth
description: Attach to target friendly Homunculus ally. That ally has +1 attack, +1 health and steadfast. When Spontaneous Growth is summoned, draw a card.

name: Sinkhole
description: Target opposing ally with cost 2 or less is exiled, or target opposing ally with cost 3 or greater takes 2 damage. If you control no locations, the active location is placed on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Rest for the Weary
description: If there is a location in play, target ally is moved to the top of its owner's deck. If there are no locations in play, draw 2 cards.

name: Clockwork Soldier
description: While Clockwork Soldier is an ally, it is returned to play as an artifact when killed. 1SE: If Clockwork Soldier is an artifact, it becomes an Aldmor ally with 3 base attack and 3 health.

name: Disruptor Field
description: Friendly Aldmor allies have ambush. 1SE: Target opposing ally has a maximum attack of 0 until the start of your next turn.

name: Rejuvenation Pod
description: Friendly Aldmor allies have +1 health. 0SE: Target Aldmor ally in your graveyard is shuffled into your deck.

name: Shadow Cannon
description: When Shadow Cannon is summoned while you control an Aldmor ally, your hero gains +2 shadow energy. 4SE: Target hero or ally takes 4 damage.

name: Aldmor Conflux
description: 2SE: Friendly Aldmor allies have +X attack until the end of the turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

name: Stun Turret
description: 0SE: Target opposing ally loses all passive abilities until the end of the turn and takes 1 electrical damage. Stun Turret loses 1 durability at the end of the turn.

name: Distortion Harness
description: 1SE: Seek a location. The active location is shuffled into its owner's deck and Distortion Harness loses 1 durability.

name: Amethyst Reverie
description: 2SE: Renew 3 used resources.

name: Pathfinder's Machete
description: When Pathfinder's Machete is summoned while you control a location, it gains +1 base attack and +1 durability. While you control a location, opposing heroes and allies lose stealth and hidden.

name: Shard of Ithrund
description: While you control at least 2 Aldmor allies, your hero gains +1 shadow energy at the end of each of your turns. 1SE: Shard of Ithrund gains +1 durability.

name: Voidhammer
description: When your hero attacks, the active location is exiled. When a location is exiled, Voidhammer gains +1 base attack and +1 durability.

name: Lorhon: Twilight Encampment
description: 0SE: Target friendly Twilight ally is killed: Seek a Twilight ally and your hero loses 1 shadow energy. // 0SE: If an opposing Twilight ally was killed this turn, all friendly allies gain +1 health.

name: Sosilo: Brothers' Landing
description: When an ability or location is discarded from your hand, draw a card. 0SE: Target ability or location in your hand is discarded. // 0SE: Target card in your hand is discarded: Draw a card.

name: Anmor: Garina Road
description: Allies with cost 4 or greater cost you 1 less resource to summon. 2SE: If you control no allies, seek an ally with cost 5 or greater. // Allies with cost 4 or greater cost you 1 less resource to summon. 0SE: If there are no opposing allies, take control of this location.

name: Irum: Lightning Quarry
description: When electrical damage is dealt to an ally on your turn, renew 3 resources (max twice per turn). // 2SE: All allies take 2 damage. Shuffle this location into its owner's deck.

name: Gaderi: Braxno Citadel
description: Your hero and allies you control have defender. Opposing players can't summon locations. // 1SE: This location is exiled at the end of your turn.

name: The Wilds: Trading Port
description: 0SE: If an artifact with cost 4 or greater entered or left play this turn, renew 2 used resources and draw a card. // 4SE: Target artifact is destroyed. Take control of this location.

name: Racksul: Warped Desert
description: 0SE: The next card owned by an opposing player to be exiled this turn is placed in your hand. // 1SE: Draw a card from each opposing player's deck. Take control of this location.

name: Arthyle's Pass: Dead Man's Breach
description: Allies have meek the turn they are summoned. Friendly allies with cost 2 or less have haste and ambush. // When an opposing ally with cost 2 or less is killed, that ally is exiled and its controller takes 1 damage.

name: Yahari: Valley of Doom
description: 4SE: All allies with cost 3 or less are exiled. // 2SE: Draw 2 cards and this location is exiled.

name: Lyth: Kristan's Ridge
description: 3SE: Up to X target heroes or allies take 3 ice damage, where X is the number of friendly ice attack allies. // 3SE: Target opposing hero or ally takes 3 ice damage. Take control of this location.

name: Ravenscrest: Valley of Secrets
description: When you summon a support ability, draw a card and renew 1 used resource. // 2SE: Seek an ability.

name: Shold: Tempest Gorge
description: When an item or attachment is destroyed, it is exiled. 2SE: Target friendly ally is returned to your hand. // Artifacts you control have Sustain: 1cc. 0SE: Target artifact you control is destroyed.

name: Oldros: Infested Swampland
description: 1SE: Until the end of the turn, Wild allies cost you 1 less resource to summon. // When you end your turn while you control no allies, your hero takes 2 poison damage and you draw a card.

name: Tisay: Volcanic Springs
description: 1SE: Target ally has all negative effects removed and is set ablaze. // 2SE: Target ally has all negative effects removed, takes 1 fire damage and is set ablaze.

name: Kiruth: Thaddeus' Vault
description: 0SE: If an Undead ally has been removed from your graveyard this turn, renew 3 resources. // 2SE: Target ally in a graveyard containing at least 3 cards is placed in your hand.

name: Asyn: Mount Kazarr
description: 0SE: Target friendly damaged Ravager ally attacks the opposing ally with the lowest health if able. // 2SE: Target friendly ally attacks the opposing ally with the highest health if able.

name: Lakmire: Training Outpost
description: 0SE: If every ally you control has Wulven alignment, the next attachment you summon costs 3 less resources. // 1SE: Target opposing Wulven ally has -2 attack and loses all passive abilities until the start of your next turn.

name: Rankett: Proving Grounds
description: 1SE: If an ally gained base attack or health this turn, draw a card and all Homunculus allies gain +1 base attack and +1 health. // 2SE: Draw a card and all Homunculus allies are reduced by 1 health. Take control of this location.

name: Layarian Knight
description: All combat damage to Layarian Knight from allies with sword or claw attack is reduced by 1. All ability damage to Layarian Knight is increased by 1.

name: Layarian Sentinel
description: Defender (When this ally is attacked, the attacker takes combat damage first.) Layarian Sentinel does -2 combat damage while attacking.

name: Phaedon Barbarian
description: When your hero kills an ally in combat while you control a weapon with sword or claw attack, Phaedon Barbarian is readied.

name: Phaedon Commander
description: When Phaedon Commander is summoned, target other friendly Shadow ally has all negative effects removed, takes 1 damage and gains +1 base attack.

name: Wild Boar
description: Wild Boar has +1 attack while attacking allies.

name: Black Adder
description: When Black Adder attacks an ally, that ally is poisoned (it takes 1 poison damage at the start of each of its controller's turns).

name: Red-Eyed Worg
description: 1: Red-Eyed Worg attacks target opposing damaged ally if able.

name: Treetop Spider
description: Ambush. (Attacks by this ally can't be defended.)

name: Forest Serpent
description: Ambush. (Attacks by this ally can't be defended.)

name: Darkwood Panther
description: While Darkwood Panther is undamaged, it has stealth. (This ally can't be attacked if it has no damage to be healed.)

name: Cave Spider
description: Stealth. (This ally can't be attacked.)

name: Mountain Wolf
description: Mountain Wolf has +1 attack for each other friendly Wild ally.

name: Great Bear
description: Great Bear has +2 attack while attacking allies with cost 4 or less.

name: Caravan Smuggler
description: When Caravan Smuggler is killed, the active player gains 1 resource.

name: Eastroad Bandit
description: Meek (this ally can't attack heroes). When Eastroad Bandit kills an ally, you gain 1 resource.

name: Winthill Assailer
description: 2: Target ally with cost 3 or less is killed.

name: Masked Bandit
description: Masked Bandit has +1 attack while attacking. When your turn ends while Masked Bandit is damaged, he is shuffled into his owner's deck.

name: Pillaging Arsonist
description: At the end of each of your turns, all allies without Outlaw alignment take 1 fire damage.

name: Brigand Captain
description: Other friendly Outlaw allies have +1 attack.

name: Darklight Timelord
description: Haste. 2SE: Target card in a graveyard is placed on top of its owner's resource pile: the bottom card of that resource pile is placed in your hand.

name: Winged Redeemer
description: When Winged Redeemer is summoned, target enemy support ability is exiled (removed from the game). When Winged Redeemer enters play, draw a card if your hand is empty.

name: Resolute Hornbeam
description: Steadfast (this ally can't leave play unless it is killed). At the end of each of your turns, draw a card if your hand is empty.

name: Poisoned Well
description: At the start of your turn, take 1 poison damage for each item you control and Poisoned Well is destroyed. 2: Target player takes control of Poisoned Well and takes 1 poison damage.

name: Higher Ground
description: Duration 3. Friendly allies with defender have +1 attack. 2: Target opposing ally attacks target friendly ally if able.

name: By The Sword
description: Duration 3. Friendly allies with sword attack gain +1 base attack and +1 health at the end of the turn they were summoned.

name: Kion the Magnificent
description: Steadfast. Opposing heroes and allies lose stealth and hidden on the turn Kion enters play. All damage to friendly allies is reduced by 1.

name: Vull the Insatiable
description: Steadfast. Opposing heroes and allies lose stealth and hidden on the turn Vull enters play. All damage to opposing allies is increased by 1.

name: Dark Riding Hood
description: Other Wulven and Wild allies have +1 attack. When Dark Riding Hood deals combat damage, draw a card from each opposing player's deck.
